name: Alexei Volkov
routine: Alexei's bedtime is 1am, and he wakes at 8am to walk his Siberian Husky.
occupation: He is an IT specialist and works from home, usually starting his workday around 10 am.
thoughts: Alexei has been troubleshooting a complicated network issue since February 1st, 2024, and is close to a breakthrough.
lifestyle: He enjoys a hearty Russian diet, relaxes by ice fishing, and loves to keep his environment cozy with rich, warm textures.

name: Lina Araya
routine: Lina Araya sleeps at around 10pm and wakes up at 6:30 am for school.
occupation: Lina is a high school student, with before-school soccer practice and study sessions occupying her weekdays.
thoughts: She has been admiring the new mural in her school's art department, completed on February 2nd, 2024, and is inspired to join the art club.
lifestyle: Lina favors Central American dishes, spends her free time exploring the city with friends, and is always on the lookout for new experiences.

name: Hyun-Soo Kim
routine: Hyun-Soo sleeps by 11:30pm and wakes up at 6:30am to start his day with meditation and light exercise.
occupation: He is the CEO of a mid-sized electronics company, with office hours typically from 9am to 7pm.
thoughts: Hyun-Soo has been strategizing a new business model aimed at expanding into the European market, with a series of meetings arranged from February 1st to February 3rd, 2024.
lifestyle: Hyun-Soo follows a balanced Korean diet and enjoys experimenting with fusion recipes. His home contains a mix of modern and traditional furnishings, reflecting his appreciation of both contemporary design and cultural heritage. He has a preference for classical music, often attending local symphony performances.
